summary.para: Updates the provided child based on the parameters specified by the provided .

param.name: pbc
param.para: An interface on a bind context object. Used to specify parameters for updating the child . This value can be NULL.

param.name: ppidlOut
param.para: A pointer to the child relative to the parent folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: If pbc is NULL or does not contain any parameters that apply to the current Shell folder, ppidlOut points to the same as pidlIn.

summary.para: Provides a method to update the of the child of a folder object.

remarks.para: Implement this interface for an implementation to update the provided child .
